law.text: The cabinet may charge a fee necessary to recover all costs incurred by the implementation and operation of the asbestos programs required under KRS 224.20-300.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 204, sec. 2, effective July 14, 1992. - Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 413, sec. 2, effective April 8, 1988.
